titles.title: A concurrent resolution directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 5009.
A concurrent resolution directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 5009.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Rogers (AL) asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 5009 (Servicemember Quality of Life Improvement and National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2025). Such corrections include increases to the basic pay chart for enlisted members, inserting a section to amend the definition of service in the uniformed services in the Higher Education Act of 1965, and amending the long title of the act.
